data.text:
Disclaimer: This is not meant to be a comprehensive list of all of Craig's television/film roles, voice-over work, or cameo appearances.

Holy shite, is google sites awful. I had this all updated nice and purty using Chrome, and this garbage interface will not publish my changes. Rage! I can make changes in Firefox, but the images never effing load enough for me to grab and move them around. Double rage! Basura!

Craig Ferguson: Hobo Fabulous

Craig Ferguson's sixth US stand-up special was filmed at various venues across the United States and Canada throughout 2018-2019. This special is not available on DVD, but there is a six-episode special series available on Amazon Prime, Apple TV/iTunes, GooglePlay and more.

Amazon streaming link: https://www.amazon.com/The-Bowie-Joke/dp/B07Y6MS1TZ

IMDb: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt10207430/?ref_=nv_sr_srsg_0

Craig Ferguson: Tickle Fight

Craig Ferguson's fifth US stand-up special was filmed live at the Monument-National in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, on July 29, 2017.The special is a Netflix exclusive and premiered on December 5, 2017. This special is not available on DVD, but can be purchased on vinyl: https://www.amazon.com/Tickle-Fight-Craig-Ferguson/dp/B07FDVCMCK

IMDb entry: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt7193448/

Craig Ferguson: Just Being Honest

Craig Ferguson's fourth US stand-up special was filmed live at The Town Hall in New York City on March 7, 2015. (Grammy nominated for 2016!)

The special premiered on EPiX on September 10, 2015 and is not available on DVD.

Available streaming on Amazon Prime: https://www.amazon.com/Craig-Ferguson-Just-Being-Honest/dp/B0191HFKQQ

Digital audio on iTunes:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/just-being-honest/id1030105421

EPix website:

http://www.epixhd.com/movie/craig-ferguson-just-being-honest/

IMDb entry:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt4512444/combined

Craig Ferguson: I'm Here To Help

Craig Ferguson's third US stand-up special, which was filmed live at Washington DC's Warner Theatre on November 16, 2012, premiered on Netflix, March 15, 2013. (Grammy nominated for 2014!)

The Grammy Nominated "I'm Here To Help" is now available on DVD, CD, or digitally here:

DVD on Amazon:

http://www.amazon.com/Im-Here-Help-Craig-Ferguson/dp/B00CQRNLLU

CD/MP3 on Amazon:

http://www.amazon.com/Im-Here-Help-Craig-Ferguson/dp/B00CQRNLII

Digital Audio on iTunes:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/im-here-to-help/id671031191

Digital Video on iTunes:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/movie/craig-ferguson-im-here-to-help/id664930462

Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said

Craig Ferguson's second US stand-up special, which was filmed live at Nashville's Tennessee Performing Arts Center on November 20, 2010 premiered on @EPIXhd February 19, 2011. Check out the behind-the-scenes interviews and pics here: http://www.epixhd.com/movie/craig-ferguson-does-this-need-to-be-said/

"Does This Need To Be Said" is now available on DVD or digital video here:

DVD:

http://www.amazon.com/Craig-Ferguson-Does-This-Need/dp/B005FHHD58

Digital Video on iTunes:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/movie/craig-ferguson-does-this-need/id479081640

You may also be able to catch it on EpixHD or streaming on Netflix.

Craig Ferguson: A Wee Bit O' Revolution

Craig Ferguson's first US stand-up special was filmed live at Boston's Wilbur Theatre on September 6, 2008.

"A Wee Bit o' Revolution" is available on DVD or at a retail outlet near you, or via amazon.com.

Digital Audio on Amazon:

http://www.amazon.com/A-Wee-Bit-ORevolution-Explicit/dp/B001UQK8TQ

Digital Audio on iTunes:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/a-wee-bit-o-revolution/id305785882

Digital Video on iTunes:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/movie/craig-ferguson-wee-bit-orevolution/id306264460

This special may also available via Netflix's DVD & Instant queues!

(Be sure to watch the special features, which includes Craig's delightful Faneuil Hall speech from July 4, 2008!)

Between the Bridge and the River

Craig's debut novel, "Between the Bridge and the River," tells the story of two childhood friends from Scotland and two illegitimate half-brothers from the American South, love, loss, greed, hope, revenge, religion, Hollywood, and redemption.

Currently available in Hardcover, Paperback, and Kindle versions:

http://www.amazon.com/Between-Bridge-River-Craig-Ferguson/dp/0811853756

Audiobook version, as read by Craig Ferguson, is available now!Audiobook CD:

Audible Download:

http://www.audible.com/pd/Fiction/Between-the-Bridge-and-the-River-Audiobook/B00HXICT1U

iTunes Download:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/audiobook/between-bridge-river-unabridged/id804288989

Publication date: March 23, 2006

Audiobook release date: Feb 18, 2014

Merchandise for Craig Ferguson

Merchandise for The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson (T-Shirt(s), Snake Mugs, Other Mug(s), and Hat(s)) are no longer available on the CBS website. You may find new or used items on eBay.

Merchandise for Craig Ferguson and his stand-up tour is available on Craig's website here: http://thecraigfergusonshow.com/

Charities supported by Craig*

*Disclaimer: * When I say "supported by Craig," I mean he is either on the board, has publicly supported them, and/or been involved with them in some way. I will note the level of involvement as best as I know it to be.

Lollipop Theater Network

Craig Ferguson is/was? on the Advisory Board for Lollipop, which is an organization that brings first-run movies and other "movie magic" to children facing long-term hospitalization, making their lives (and their family's lives) just a bit more normal.

You can find Lollipop on twitter here: @LollipopTheater

The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) Agency's primary purpose is to safeguard the rights and well-being of refugees. It strives to ensure that everyone can exercise the right to seek asylum and find safe refuge in another State, with the option to return home voluntarily, integrate locally or to resettle in a third country. It also has a mandate to help stateless people.Craig first posted a link to the UN Refugee Agency's donation page on 6/20/15 "World Refugee Day," has since tweeted/retweeted several posts about UNHCR, and has participated in a "Words Matter" video, which he tweeted about on 9/27/15.

Craig has also tweeted that all New Deal Tour merchandising profits will go to UNHCR.

The ARCHIE Foundation "Makes the Difference" for sick children and their families in the North of Scotland.

The Foundation is focused on the Royal Aberdeen Children's Hospital, the Children's Ward in Inverness, and the Children's Ward in Elgin, but also does work in community hospitals throughout the North of Scotland.

The ARCHIE and The American-Scottish Foundations announced on 12/23/2015 that Craig (and Megan) Ferguson made a "transformational" donation to The ARCHIE Foundation, which will be used to support developments in the Royal Aberdeen Children's Hospital's High Dependency Unit (soon to be renamed the Ferguson Critical Care Unit).

For more information about The ARCHIE Foundation, see:

http://www.archiefoundationhome.org.uk/

For more information about the American-Scottish Foundation, see:

http://www.americanscottishfoundation.com/home/index.html

The USO's mission is to lift the spirits of America's troops and their families. Craig has done at least two brief "tours" with USO.

You can find USO on twitter here: @the_USO

Craig has been a supporter of S.A.Y. (Super All Year) Detroit, regularly calling in and offering incentive items during Mitch Albom's annual Radiothon. S.A.Y. Detroit is aimed at improving the lives of the Detroit area's neediest citizens, through shelter, food, medical care, volunteer efforts and education.

You can find Mitch Albom on the tweety @MitchAlbom

To donate or for more information, visit: https://www.mitchalbomradiothon.com/index.php

No public support of this organization as of yet, but Craig has quietly donated in the past to fundraising efforts for Cahonas Scotland, an organization working to educate in matters relating to male cancers (Testicular Cancer, Prostate Cancer, and Male Breast Cancer), and to reduce discrimination and stigma from the cancer experience. They aim to bring positive change in Male Cancer Awareness. Check your baws, boys!

You can find Cahonas Scotland on twitter here: @CahonasScotland

No public support of this organization as of yet, but according to someone who attended a late Sept 2014 taping of TLLS, Craig taped a segment promoting the STV Appeal. This organization helps children and young people in Scotland who are affected by poverty. Every penny raised stays in Scotland!

You can find STV Appeal on twitter here: @STVAppeal

"Doc Martin" is a television series based on characters created by Craig Ferguson for the movie "Saving Grace." According to this article, two prequel telefilms (written by Craig Ferguson and Mark Crowdy) are available on DVD now at amazon or other fine DVD outlets near you!

Acting roles or cameo appearances

This is not meant to be a comprehensive list of all of Craig's acting appearances, voice-over work, or cameo appearances.

Duck Duck Goose (2019)

Release Date April 20, 2018?? (IMDb)

How to Train Your Dragon 3 (2019)

Release Date March 1, 2019 (IMDb)

Hero of Color City (2014)

Release Date October 3. 2014 (IMDb)

http://www.amazon.com/The-Hero-Color-City-Blu-ray/dp/B00LM0GNX0/

Amazon download: http://www.amazon.com/Hero-Color-City-Christina-Ricci/dp/B00O4UB7D6

iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/movie/the-hero-of-color-city/id920319475

DVD/Blu-Ray Avail 12/2/2014: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00LM0GNX0/
